alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canyon, or 21 miles north of Cloquet, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central St. Louis County, including the following locations... Shaw, Taft, Nichols Lake and Fish Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
